name: wt-journey-backend-01-etapa-4-luizfilipe-bp
description: [![Review Assignment Due Date](https://classroom.github.com/assets/deadline-readme-button-22041afd0340ce965d47ae6ef1cefeee28c7c493a6346c4f15d667ab976d596c.svg)](https://classroom.github.com/a/rskcst-g) # Etapa 4: Segurança, Autenticação e Aplicação Completa em Node.js

scripts.db:cli: sudo docker exec -it postgres-db psql -U postgres -d policia_db
scripts.db:drop: sudo docker exec -it postgres-db psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS policia_db;'
scripts.db:create: sudo docker exec -it postgres-db psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE policia_db;'
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d && sleep 4 && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run
